title: Data Manager
description: A Data Manager project, parsing data from a CSV file and store it using data structures like HashTables and Lists to perform queries.

title: Roguelite Game
description: A Roguelite-ish Game using C language made to encode algorithms and data structures in an imperative programming language.

title: Crossy Road
description: A Crossy Road-ish Game using Haskell, a functional programming language that taught us the main principles of coding a game.
